member_organisations:
The Swedish Trade Union Confederation (LO): www.lo.se 
The Confederation of Professional Employees (TCO): www.tco.se 
The Swedish Confederation of Professional Associations (Saco): www.saco.se
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Mainly following issues regarding Employment and Social Affairs, Internal Market, Industry and Research, Legal Affairs and Constitutional Affairs.
organisation_name: Brussels Office of the Swedish Trade Unions
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: The Swedish Trade Union Confederations are members of the European Trade Union Confederation (ETUC).
goals__remit: The aim of the Brussels Office of the Swedish Trade Unions is to support the work of the national central confederations and their affiliates in relation to promoting European integration.
